p.span: ***Just a reminder...if you need technology assistance, the tech hotline is available on Monday - Friday from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm. The telephone number is 812-738-7803 or you can email at techhotline@shcsc.k12.in.us. Nearly 150 students have sought assistance...can we help you?***

img.alt: ***Just a reminder...if you need technology assistance, the tech hotline is available on Monday - Friday from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm. The telephone number is 812-738-7803 or you can email at techhotline@shcsc.k12.in.us. Nearly 150 students have sought assistance...can we help you?***

p.span:
A huge thank you to Lucas Oil Products for the donation of hand sanitizer to each of our food distribution sites!
Do you wish you could purchase some for yourself? You can make your purchase through Eckart Supply Company. If you would like more information about the product, check out this article directly from Lucas Oil:
lucasoil.com/lucas-oil-news/latest-news/5184-lucas-oil-hand-sanitizer-refill-bottles-now-available
We are very blessed to have such amazing business partners in our community. Thank you!

img.alt:
A huge thank you to Lucas Oil Products for the donation of hand sanitizer to each of our food distribution sites!
Do you wish you could purchase some for yourself? You can make your purchase through Eckart Supply Company. If you would like more information about the product, check out this article directly from Lucas Oil: https://lucasoil.com/lucas-oil-news/latest-news/5184-lucas-oil-hand-sanitizer-refill-bottles-now-available
We are very blessed to have such amazing business partners in our community. Thank you!

p.span: Harrison County is performing at a higher rate than Indiana and the US as of April 18. The overall National rate of completion was 50.5% and Indiana was 53.6%. Harrison County was 56.2%. Great job but let’s continue to remind family and friends of the importance to complete the 2020 Census. The post below includes an interactive link where you can look across the country at submission rates...even your own town! If you’re needing something new to do, take a look! Have a great day...enjoy some sunshine ☀️.50 percent of households have responded to the #2020Census. Curious about the response rates in your community? Visit: 2020census.gov/en/response-rates.html

img.alt: Harrison County is performing at a higher rate than Indiana and the US as of April 18. The overall National rate of completion was 50.5% and Indiana was 53.6%. Harrison County was 56.2%. Great job but let’s continue to remind family and friends of the importance to complete the 2020 Census. The post below includes an interactive link where you can look across the country at submission rates...even your own town! If you’re needing something new to do, take a look! Have a great day...enjoy some sunshine ☀️.
